caption.center: THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF ILLINOIS, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. DAVID BARTON

court.center: Appellate Court of Illinois, Second District.

opinion.posture: APPEAL from the Circuit Court of Winnebago County; the Hon. ALBERT S. O'SULLIVAN, Judge, presiding.
opinion.attorneys:
Ralph Ruebner, of State Appellate Defender's Office, of Elgin, for appellants.
Philip G. Reinhard, State's Attorney, of Rockford (James W. Jerz and Edward N. Morris, of Illinois State's Attorneys Association, of counsel), for the People.
